metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13306 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Upstream kernel mnh driver.Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-70295063.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-euclid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
